title: MAZE SPRINT TRIAD
headline: FROM FOREST TO ARENA — THE NEXT GENERATION OF SPORT
body: Born from years of international orienteering experience and creative innovation, Maze Sprint Triad redefines what a race can be. It’s not just about finding your way — it’s about strategy, split-second decisions, and the thrill of competition in front of a live audience. Powered by Nordic expertise. Designed for global reach.
